      public StackLinkedList()

  • Method Details

    • push

      public void push(T data)
      Pushes an element onto the top of the stack.
      Parameters:
      data - The element to be added.

    • pop

      public T pop()
      Removes and returns the top element of the stack.
      Returns:
      The removed top element, or null if the stack is empty.

    • peek

      public T peek()
      Retrieves, but does not remove, the top element of the stack.
      Returns:
      The top element, or null if the stack is empty.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the stack is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the stack is empty, false otherwise.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of elements in the stack.
      Returns:
      The size of the stack.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Removes all elements from the stack.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(T data)
      Checks if the stack contains a specific element.
      Parameters:
      data - The element to check for.
      Returns:
      True if the element is in the stack, false otherwise.

    • toArray

      public T[] toArray()
      Returns an array representation of the stack.
      Returns:
      An array containing all elements in the stack.

    • printStack

      public void printStack()
      Prints the stack elements from top to bottom.
